alert.note: Alert for Bell; Clay; Harlan; Knox; Leslie (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 4:56PM EST until January 01 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Harlan County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Leslie County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EST. * At 455 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Girdler, or near Barbourville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hammond around 500 PM EST. Salt Gum around 505 PM EST. Ashers Fork around 510 PM EST. Queendale around 515 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Essie and Asher. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for south central and southeastern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
